thread.title: 'They don't give up on me,' boy says of men who adopted 4 teens
thread.title_full: 'They don't give up on me,' boy says of men who adopted 4 teens

author: Danielle Salisbury | Danielle_Salisbury@mlive.com
title: 'They don't give up on me,' boy says of men who adopted 4 teens
text: The men, together about 20 years, have now adopted four teenage boys, among the most difficult for social service agencies to permanently place. They are working toward adopting a fifth son, a 9-year-old now in foster care.
